metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37837 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: libjpeg commit db33a6e was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via LineBitmapRequester::EncodeRegion at linebitmaprequester.cpp. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is an issue in libjpeg, not libjpeg6b, libjpeg9, or libjpeg-turbo which are unrelated

criterions.comment: libjpeg package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
